kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Pause Execution
kw.arg: กรุณายืนยัน MFA ในมือถือให้เรียบร้อย แล้วค่อยกลับมากด OK ตรงนี้
kw.doc: Pauses execution until user clicks ``Ok`` button.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the specified keyword and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.
